item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. I Self-Hosted Llama 3.2 with Coolify on My Home Server (170 points | 72 comments)
2. Show HN: Graphite, a Blender-inspired 2D procedural design Rust app (463 points | 66 comments)
3. Sqlite3 WebAssembly (549 points | 158 comments)
4. The Internet Archive and its 916B saved web pages are back online (41 points | 8 comments)
5. MacOS sometimes leaks traffic after system updates (177 points | 75 comments)
6. Floss/fund: $1M per year for free and open source projects (91 points | 20 comments)
7. The C23 edition of Modern C (439 points | 239 comments)
8. CapibaraZero: A cheap alternative to FlipperZero based on ESP32-S3 (269 points | 52 comments)
9. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (701 points | 135 comments)
10. Redbox left PII on decommissioned machines (161 points | 75 comments)
11. Show HN: I 3D scanned the tunnels inside the Maya Pyramid Temples at Copan (362 points | 70 comments)
12. Eye Contact Correction: Redirecting the eyes to look at the camera (96 points | 97 comments)
13. Asterinas: OS kernel written in Rust and providing Linux-compatible ABI (271 points | 145 comments)
14. Why don't we use awnings anymore (2022) (210 points | 192 comments)
15. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (359 points | 136 comments)
16. Apple introduces iPad mini built for Apple Intelligence (279 points | 413 comments)
17. Damas-Hindley-Milner inference two ways (62 points | 4 comments)
18. Mothbox 4.0 (229 points | 29 comments)
19. How ham radio endures (77 points | 21 comments)
20. Australian coal plant in 'extraordinary' survival experiment (78 points | 107 comments)
21. FreeBSD/EC2 boot performance over time (91 points | 31 comments)
22. One possible housing crisis solution? Public housing for all income levels (4 points | discuss)
23. Show HN: FTWA – Turn any website into an app (105 points | 36 comments)
24. Commission concludes that X should not be designated under the DMA (19 points | 18 comments)
25. Life expectancy rise in rich countries slows down: took 30 years to prove (158 points | 323 comments)
26. Show HN: Mermaid ASCII Diagrams (198 points | 40 comments)
27. Cofounder Mode: My tactical guide to finding a cofounder (97 points | 48 comments)
28. Show HN: A Markdown-based alternative to package.json scripts and makefiles (92 points | 37 comments)
29. Big advance on simple-sounding math problem was a century in the making (103 points | 27 comments)
30. The Sundial Cannon of Åtvidaberg (2017) (57 points | 26 comments)
